patio_Glorgan: Ahh... Can you smell it? The flowers are intoxicating!$h
spouseRoom_Glorgan: Now where can I add more flowers in here... The ones next to the forge keep wilting. What if I freeze the pots they're in every night?
funLeave_Glorgan: I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house and find some new flowers to transplant.
funReturn_Glorgan: I had a nice, relaxing time today. I didn't find any new flowers though... $s#$b#How did your day go?
Rainy_Day_0: You look a little soggy, dear. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
Rainy_Day_1: Good morning! I got up early and did some foraging. Here, take one.[20 404 402 398]#$e#Searching for edible goodies is like going on a treasure hunt. It's a lot of fun!$h
Rainy_Day_2: It's days like this I'm really happy about my heavy-duty boots.$h
Rainy_Day_3: Do I hear a leak in the roof? I'll have to check it out. I know a thing or two about carpentry.
Rainy_Day_4: Might want to do some fishing or mining today, huh?
Rainy_Night_0: I'm ready to hop into bed whenever you are. The sound of rain will put us right to sleep.
Rainy_Night_1: How was your day? Did you see any animals out there?
Rainy_Night_2: It's going to be relaxing to fall asleep on a night like this...$l
Rainy_Night_3: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and and...$k#$b#Get warm...$l
Rainy_Night_4: How was your day today, dear? Muddy out there?$h
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, @! I made us some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of coffee.$h
Indoor_Day_1: Hey, honey! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!
Indoor_Day_2: I'm glad I've learned to enjoy cleaning! The house gets dirty very easily.$10#$e#It's satisfying to get everything squeaky clean.#$e#Can I have a kiss before you leave?$l
Indoor_Day_3: Good morning, @. I've planted these in a little pot out back... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#I grew that with great love and attention. Enjoy it!$h
Indoor_Day_4: Always remember to keep your eyes peeled for wild food! There's lots out there.
Indoor_Night_0: Welcome home, @. I hope you had a wonderful day.
Indoor_Night_1: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...#$b#I wish all my fellow dwarves could know this feeling.$h
Indoor_Night_2: Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h
Indoor_Night_3: Are you ready for bed soon? I made the bed special for us...$l
Indoor_Night_4: Good evening, honey. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today?#$b#If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!$l
Outdoor_0: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.
Outdoor_1: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.$h
Outdoor_2: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*$h
Outdoor_3: Hey. When I stand here and look out over our land... I'm really proud. You've done great work!
Outdoor_4: My wildest dreams have come true... just look at this incredible landscape!
OneKid_0: It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for the outdoors.
OneKid_1: You think %kid1 will like flowers as much as I do?$h
OneKid_2: I think I might bake %kid1 some poppy seed muffins today.$h#$b#But I dont want to have to pick any poppies...$s
OneKid_3: Now that we have %kid1, I kind of want a second one!$h#$b#Hint Hint!$l
OneKid_4: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Ma...ma".$h
TwoKids_0: We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?
TwoKids_1: My own smith at home, an automaton running my shop in Durin's Rest, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful spouse. Life is darn good!$h
TwoKids_2: We've come a long way, @! Look at our family!$h#$b# To be honest, I never really thought I'd end up living with a human...$k#$e#Now that I'm here with you @, I love it!$l
TwoKids_3: %kid1 and %kid2 keep messing up my flowers...$a#$b#But that's okay! As much as I love flowers I love %kid1 and %kid2 more!$h
TwoKids_4: We have to make sure we give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2.$k#$b#We don't want any jealousy between them!$h
Good_0: Did I ever tell you... when you first came to Durin's Rest, the next night I had a dream that we'd be together someday.$h
Good_1: Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Good_2: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Good_3: @...I still can't believe we're married... It's a dream come true!$l
Good_4: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Oh, my... you look beautiful today.$l
Neutral_0: When I take mornin' walks I do my best to avoid everyone. Humans are... Odd beasts...
Neutral_1: Do ya think yer Grandpa would approve of a dwarf living in his house?
Neutral_2: Yer a strange one, to want to live with a dwarf like me...
Neutral_3: Ya think we could get in trouble for being married? A dwarf an' a human under the same roof?$s
Neutral_4: I think I'm gonna clean the house all day. This'll actually be fun!$h
Bad_0: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Bad_1: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?$s
Bad_2: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Bad_3: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...$s
spring_1: I walk outside and all I feel is your love!%revealtasteGlorgan421%revealtasteGlorgan402%revealtasteGlorgan591%revealtasteGlorgan593%revealtasteGlorgan595%revealtasteGlorgan597%revealtasteGlorgan376%revealtasteGlorgan22%revealtasteGlorgan418%revealtasteGlorgan283%revealtasteGlorgan18$l#$b#I can't help but smile. These flowers are so amazing!$h#$e#Wow... Spring sure is the best season!$h
summer_1: What can I do fer ya?#$e#I've got the finest wares in the land! And the finest husband to boot!$h^I've got the finest wares in the land! And the finest wife to boot!$h
fall_1: Some say money was invented so a foolish man could control a wise one...$k#$b#I say it was invented so I could buy you as many marvelous things as I can!$h
winter_1: Good day @!!$h#$b#Even though it's chilly out there, yer love always warms up the cockles of my heart!
summer_26: Hi @! I take it you remembered my birthday?%revealtasteGlorgan421%revealtasteGlorgan402%revealtasteGlorgan591%revealtasteGlorgan593%revealtasteGlorgan595%revealtasteGlorgan597%revealtasteGlorgan376%revealtasteGlorgan22%revealtasteGlorgan418%revealtasteGlorgan283%revealtasteGlorgan18#$b#I sure do love flowers on my birthday!
